overview: The film explores a mother-daughter relationship where a young, 20-year old Aparna  (Appu), who at the face of grief stumbles upon her motherâ€™s notebook, opening her up to  a past life that lived and breathed. With a hint of nostalgia, Forty keeps switching between  the past and the present, of all that is said and unsaid.  With sombre frames and minimal music, the film tries to maintain its intimacy and desires,  celebrating life through different times and spaces.
tagline: There are certain conversations that one partakes in, in the course of their lifetime, which  question their very own existence.
title: Forty
